channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:03 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Since further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:03 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Since further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 06:25 PM Anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
